11523112122.title: Out of the frying pan

115231121221.content:
The thrilling fight against the monster before having reached its conclusion, Trini finally had some free time, a sense of accomplishment, and a fair amount of sweat built up. She needed days off like this to maintain a disciplined mind and body; and no matter what Rita did to ruin that, she'd find some way to recover her lost time. Listening to her friend talk excitedly about events at school that day, she smiled quietly. They might not even find anything at this store - but something good would come out of this.

Of course, nothing good was coming out of this excursion for you, pinned down by the immense, blank wall. With a THWUMP, the whole cavern moved forward, crashing to the ground. Only a few seconds later, you heard something similar in the distance - followed by another lift, and a loud SLAM. Thankfully, there was enough cushioning to keep you safe for now; if incredibly rattled. The constant movement, sudden shifts in gravity, and loud noises outside, coupled with a thin layer of moisture and a slight foul odor, combined to make a sickening sensation churn up in the depths of your gut.

What was this bizarre landscape, anyway? You tried to look around for hints. Small puddles formed around the floor, which was soft enough for your feet to sink in - unnatural for a cave. No visible stalagmites on the floor, or stalactites on the absurdly high ceiling. Only these soft fibers fighting against you, pinning you down onto the base. Every time they lifted up again in the same rhythmic motion, you felt the grip loosen, giving you more room to move - for a few seconds, before this bizarre barrier fell on you once more.

Outside, Kimberly - having found a particularly nice-looking dress - made a beeline for it. With a half-pleased, half-irritated chuckle, Trini followed behind, moving in a dash to catch up.

You struggled to keep still as the movements became more rapid, more violent. Without the slightest hint of a warning, the damp fabric was suddenly pushing onto you again and again, squeezing into your torso and upper body. You called out to see if anyone else was trapped here, still struggling against the behemoth before you; no response. The voice was lost in the intricate pattern of pale strings, and the dark shell surrounding it. With no provocation, not even giving you time to respond, this THING was continually assaulting you, its movements somehow perfectly synched to the rest of the area.

After a quick jog forward, Trini spotted the item. She reached up for it, heels lifting from the ground - tiptoeing closer.

The sudden tilt sent you completely off balance. Now, the entire weight of this white wall was pressing on you, unmoving, with no sign of stopping. If you weren't small enough to be cushioned by the soft surface, the sheer weight would easily break you apart in an instant. However, despite the bone-breaking pressure, there was one upside to this; at this angle, the salty puddles slid over you, providing you with enough lubrication to squirm out. To what direction, you're not sure - but maybe, if you can get away from this thing for a few minutes, something would clear up.

On the outside:

Trini sighed in relief as she stretched her sore muscles, there was no place like home. After a long day of battling monsters and shopping, she more than ready to plop herself down and relax. She placed her new sandals down before kicking off her shoes and flopping face first on her bed,

The soft and cool sheets were doing wonders for her. She finally sat up and took a seated position before finally getting truly comfortable. While this was happening you felt the immense relief that came with the dreaded white ceiling's retreat, unfortunately for you it would appear you were going along with it.

Apparently the cavern's bizarre moisture that smelled oddly like sweat had seeped into your clothing and was working as some sort of adhesive. When the world shifted violently and the ceiling took off, so to did you, Light immediately assaulted your vision and for a moment you thought you'd go blind.

Then it happened. You felt the world around you shift once more, and you found yourself descending. The wind speeds from your descent were so powerful you were forced to close your eyes. Panic went through your body as you couldn't understand what was happening. Where had that ceiling taken you?!

Soon it was over, and you were compressed against another hard ground. Only this time it wasn't as spongey as the cavern. It was much more dry and sturdy. The pressure was unreal, but as soon as it came it vanished, You felt yourself rise, only to fall again. It was like an endless rollercoaster at a theme park. You didn't dare open your eyes.

Again the pressure came and went until finally it didn't return. After a minute you realized you were no longer in a constant state of rise and fall. Even though your heart was beating a mile a minute, you finally cracked open your eyes. Your vision was blurry at first, but soon everything came into focus.

Was this some kind of room? It must be. There were shelves, books, carpet, windows, a closet. No different from your own room. So why was everything so giant?! While you pondered this you felt yourself shifting again. You were so lost in thought you forgot you were still stuck to the white ceiling.

This time you tried to struggle and to your own surprise you managed to unstick yourself. Thankfully the ground below you was soft and comfortable. It was like looking at vast desert of yellow sand. As you looked this landscape over an enormous sound akin to thunder filled your ears.

On instinct you covered them and turned to the source. When you did your whole body went stiff. There was someone else on this barren landscape with you. Not just any person though, but a real life giant. You were beyond scared now. It all made sense, everything was so giant because you were in the room of a giant. Or to be more precise, you were tiny!

On instinct you began to back away until you got a good look at the giant's face. She was very pretty, but also familiar. Just where had you seen her before? You scowled in thought until it finally hit you. This was the very same girl you watched on TV almost every day. Trini the yellow ranger from Mighty Morphin Power Rangers.

But how? This was impossible. She was just a fictional character on TV. This didn't make any sense. She wasn't real. But yet here you were, damn near microscopic and standing on her bed. This was insane. You must've been dreaming. Either that or you've final gone crazy.

Before you could do anything else however, the ground beneath your feet began to shift. That could only mean one thing. Trini was changing positions.

choices: She wanted to learn about you

15533332331222332.content:
Your name is Chuck. You are a respected young pilot in the Air Force and love to help people. You lived alone in a small house, happy with your life. Though you were mature and acted like an adult most times, you still liked to watch cartoons like Power Rangers or more specific the Japanese counterpart Super Sentai A couple of your friends thought this was silly, but you didn't care what they thought.

One day, you were talking to someone when the ground started to shake. You were confused and tried to figure out what started it. You drove towards the danger until something froze you in your tracks. There, right in front of you was an enormous young woman, a teenaged Japanese girl in the traditional school outfit and it wasn't just any girl, it was Miku Imamura, the pink Power Ranger or as she was known Megapink from Megaranger(Power Rangers in Space in America) She looked to be about 50 feet tall and was looking around smiling. You weren't sure what to do so you decided to just see what she did at the moment.

"こんにちは(HELLO!!)" She cried out happily at her now tiny surroundings she had no idea how she got to be on the other side of the world in America of all places and so big but also didn't care if only the other Megarangers especially Shun,the red ranger could see ditzy and gluttonous Miku now.....

As Miku started to walk away from you, you drove after her. Her giant feet left massive craters in the road, making it hard to drive. As she walked, there was chaos around her. Lots of people were screaming, terrified of her. A couple were just staring in awe at her beauty. Her giant feet were also sending tremors throughout making it hard to drive and people more afraid. You weren't about to give up though, you needed to figure out what to do.

The giantess kept walking, trying to avoid stepping on people, though it was difficult. Suddenly, someone ran in front of her, making her disorientated. She stumbled backwards, hitting the building next to her. Miku got up and started walking again, she had no idea how she got here, but she was starting to get hungry. Suddenly, she stepped on something hard, making her flinch. She lifted her foot to reveal a squashed car.

"Ohhh
ごめんなさい(Oops, I'm sorry!)" She said and continued. Though she was trying to be careful, she kept stepping on cars until she accidentally tripped on one, making her stumble and fall onto her butt. The screams of the people became louder and crazier as they saw her trembles knock down buildings and leave giant cracks in the road. You decided you needed to do something, so you left to get something. Meanwhile, the Megaranger stood up and saw what her accident caused. In the road was now a giant butt shaped crater. Miku blushed and continued as if she hadn't done anything.

The giantess took one more step before seeing what she was looking for, restaurants. She happily jogged over to a couple, making super tremors that knocked buildings down from miles and miles away. Without thinking, she ripped the roofs off and started grabbing food. People screamed and ran, not wanting to be part of her meal. She targeted both American and Japanese restaurants, shoving the food down her throat. She was so hungry, she couldn't have waited any longer. She went from restaurant to restaurant, eating everything that she could, not stopping for a minute.

Once she was finished, she sat on the last restaurant she raided, crushing everything in the building. Since there wasn't anybody in the building, she didn't care. She looked around at the beautiful city she was in. She wished she could get people to see she didn't want to hurt anybody. Suddenly, a funny feeling developed in her stomach and the rumbling got louder as the citizens' panicking state increased She put her hands on her stomach, worried she might have accidentally devoured someone by accident finally she could hold it in any longer her brown eyes grew wide as she muttered "Ohhhhhhh......" Without warning though, she instinctively opened her mouth and gave the loudest burp ever.

BUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPP!!!The sound waves traveled throughout the city,causing the ground to shake a bit and shattering glass everywhere. Miku immediately covered her mouth, blushing hard.

"すみません (Excuse me!)" She said, embarrassed, however she was glad that the feeling in her stomach went away.

Meanwhile, you had gone to get your personal jet. You weren't sure if the military knew what was happening, but even if they did, they were miles away so you had to take this matter into your own hands. As you got in, you heard a massively loud sound. You weren't sure what that was but you knew it came from the giantess. You flew out and went straight for her. It didn't take you long to get there, you found her walking in the street. It looked like most citizens fled so you didn't have to worry about casualties. You flew right next to Miku's legs, trying to get to her front. As you did, you got a look at her panties above you, making you blush, but you couldn't think about that right now. You quickly got her attention and flew around in front of her. Your plan was to try and get her to follow you out of the city.

As you flew around, you could tell that Miku was starting to get a little annoyed which worried you. Miku raised her arm, ready to smack you like a fly. You quickly moved out of the way just in time. For a few minutes, you kept having to dodge her hand, you actually enjoyed the feeling of teasing her. Unfortunately, you were so focused on her dominant arm, you didn't see her other arm in time. She grabbed your ship, opened it with force and pulled you out. She dropped your vehicle to the ground and stomped on it, breaking it instantly. She then smiled at you and carefully started to poke you.

"Please don't hurt me!" You begged, making her giggle.

"I won't, if you let me play with you." She said,'luckily Miku despite disliking school work had taken a few English speaking classes making you confused at first. Suddenly, she started to tickle you on the stomach, making you laugh hard and squirmed around Miku leaned against a tall building and kept tickling you.

"Ahaaaaaaaaaaaaaha! Plllleeeaaasssssseee stooooopppppppppppp Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!"
You begged her to stop, but she simply smiled at you.

"くすぐる(Tickle,Tickle!)" Miku cooed as she gently stroked your stomach with her index and middle fingers with girlish playful glee

She then nuzzled you with her cheek softly, giggling a little. This was a little fun for you, but it was also awkward. "You are just so cute and small, I could just eat you up. Oh well, I guess I'll just have to settle for a kiss instead." She said, bringing you in for one you could see every inch of her huge pink lips as they came closer and closer

"Muah!" She kissed you in a way thinking you were Shun in disguise but she thought you were way cuter than him covering you entirely in lipstick and her spit.

You had a feeling she was going to own you for a while. After tickling you some more…
15533332331222332.title: Not the best day to be a hero

155333323312223321.content:
Miku held you in the palm of her hand, smiling. You were just glad you got time to breathe after what happened. You looked up at her, unsure of what to do.

"そう(So)". She said, making you confused.

"What?" You asked, making her giggle.

"Tell me mister about yourself, like for instance who are you?"

"Why should I? Give me one good reason." You said without thinking. Suddenly, her other hand came towards you, putting her finger on your chest gently.

"Talk little man, unless you want to be tickled again." Miku smiled, her eyes glittered.

"Okay fine, just don't hurt me."

"I don't plan on it." You told her your name and that you were in the air force. You told her your favorite color, you like to help people and that you liked cartoons. She carefully listened quietly, catching every detail mentioned. When she first grabbed you, you were pretty scared. After all, she was really big and could hurt you easily. However, as she listened, you felt more comfortable around her. She asked if you had a family. You hesitated before answering.

"No, I don't. Both of my parents passed away, and I don't have a girlfriend. I do have a lot of friends though."

"I'm sorry for your loss. Hey, how about …"
155333323312223321.title: Getting more comfortable
